trans-unit.source:
\n

Represents a Transact-SQL transaction to be made in a SQL Server database.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxxx x Xxxxxxxx$XXX xxxxxxxxxxx xx xx xxxx xx x XXX Xxxxxx xxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

An error occurred while trying to commit the transaction.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xx xxxxx xxxxxxxx xxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
The transaction has already been committed or rolled back.

-or-

The connection is broken.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxx xxxx.$$x$$x$x$$xx$ $$x$$x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Rolls back a transaction from a pending state.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxx xxxx x xxxxxxxxxxx xxxx x xxxxxxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

An error occurred while trying to commit the transaction.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xx xxxxx xxxxxxxx xxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
The transaction has already been committed or rolled back.

-or-

The connection is broken.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxx xxxx.$$x$$x$x$$xx$ $$x$$x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Rolls back a transaction from a pending state, and specifies the transaction or savepoint name.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxx xxxx x xxxxxxxxxxx xxxx x xxxxxxx xxxxx$ xxx xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The name of the transaction to roll back, or the savepoint to which to roll back.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx xx xxxx xxxx$ xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xx xxxxx xx xxxx xxxx.

trans-unit.source:
The transaction has already been committed or rolled back.

-or-

The connection is broken.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxx xxxx.$$x$$x$x$$xx$ $$x$$x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Creates a savepoint in the transaction that can be used to roll back a part of the transaction, and specifies the savepoint name.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxx x xxxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxx xxx xx xxxx xx xxxx xxxx x xxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx$ xxx xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

An error occurred while trying to commit the transaction.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xx xxxxx xxxxxxxx xxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
The transaction has already been committed or rolled back.

-or-

The connection is broken.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxx xxxx.$$x$$x$x$$xx$ $$x$$x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxx.
